title: NO SECURITY OPTION/PET FRIENDLY
posting_body: ['Multiple units available in well maintained Garden-Style Apartment Complex!', 'Convenient location only 10 minutes away from the NYC ferry, dining , shopping and entertainment.', "Near St John's University and Wagner College.", 'Graduate students are welcomed.', 'Units available on first and second floor!', 'Also ask about Studio and 2 Bedroom units!', 'Assigned parking available for an additional fee.', 'Photos are of the one bedroom.', '1 Year Lease.', 'Included heat, hot water and maintenance.', 'Tenant pays cooking gas and electric.', 'All applicants must pay for background and credit check ($20).', "Upon lease signing 1st month's rent is due along with 1 month security deposit (OR OPT IN TO THE NO SECURITY OPTION).", 'Broker fee is one month.', 'Pets allowed with breed and weight restrictions.', 'M. Donato and Company Real Estate', 'Camille Polizzi- Real Estate Sales Person', 'For information please call:', '917 747-5797']
